name: Settlement Qualities
content:
> @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.TN4VeY75Z2Ce8IT7]{Settlements}

Name Source Details
Academic CRB pg. 405

 It is often easier to do research in this settlement, which is home to a large school, research facility, or great repository of knowledge.
Automated AP #5 pg. 46

The majority of the city’s civic functions (construction, maintenance, and so on) are performed by robots.
Biotech-focused AP #5 pg. 49

The settlement relies less on devices that can be hacked or short-circuited, but it is more susceptible to @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.GnEF27Oot3zqTaBQ]{Diseases} and toxins.
Bureaucratic CRB pg. 405

 The settlement is a nightmarish, confusing, and frustrating maze of red tape and official paperwork.
Cultured CRB pg. 405

 The settlement is well known for being a place where artistry thrives, such as a community of actors and musicians.
Devout CRB pg. 405  The settlement is devoted to a deity (which must be of the same alignment as the community) or follows a religious creed.
Financial Center CRB pg. 405

 This settlement is home to large banks, trading houses, currency exchanges and other powerful financial and mercantile organizations.
In Recession PW pg. 53

The settlement is experiencing an economic downturn, usually resulting in higher unemployment rates.
Insular CRB pg. 405

 The settlement is isolated, perhaps physically. Its citizens are fiercely loyal to one another, often making it difficult to learn secrets about them.
Notorious CRB pg. 405

 The settlement has a reputation (deserved or not) for being a den of iniquity. It is usually easier to procure illegal goods and services.
Mobile AP #5 pg. 53 The settlement is not fixed at a single geographic location; it is difficult to map, and teleportation to the settlement is not possible without line of sight.
Modular PW pg.125 The compartmentalized nature of this settlement’s construction allows for relatively easy and quick additions, renovations, and even physical rearrangement. It can also be used to physically separate parts of the city for quarantine or security purposes.
Polluted CRB pg. 405  The settlement’s magical or high-tech industry has filled the ground and sky with disgusting pollution.
Profiteering PW pg. 53 The businesses of this settlement engage in unethical practices in order to make profits.
Remote AP #4 pg. 50 Reaching this settlement is very difficult, often requiring secret knowledge or very specialized skills.
Surrounded By The Past AP #4 pg. 38 The citizens of the settlement live among the vestiges of their distant ancestors, though they can’t usually take full advantage of such relics.
Technologically Advanced CRB pg. 405  The settlement produces and uses a level of technology that isn’t widely seen elsewhere.
Technologically Average CRB pg. 405  The level of technology used by the settlement is similar to that found in the majority of other settlements.
Technologically Underdeveloped CRB pg. 405  The technology used by the settlement is less advanced than that found elsewhere.
